suboptions.name: arch
suboptions.desc: The target CPU architecture the kernel will run on

suboptions.name: scheduler_end_panic
suboptions.desc: Makes the kernel panic if no processes is remaining to run. If disabled, the kernel is halted

suboptions.name: debug
suboptions.desc: Tells whether to enable debug mode

suboptions.name: test
suboptions.desc: Tests some critical kernel features on boot, then halts

suboptions.name: testprocess
suboptions.desc: Runs the integrated test process instead of loading an executable from the disk

suboptions.name: storagetest
suboptions.desc: Tests all attached storage devices and their drives. **WARNING**: This option will erase all data on all storage devices

suboptions.name: malloc_magic
suboptions.desc: Tells whether the kernel should place a magic number on the memory chunks to check for corruption
